pullrequest.title: Possibility to enforce contact addition in ContactManager even if there are no subscribers

content.raw:
Ok, perfect! Yes that makes it easier for the test, and the addition also is more usable with the extra function. 
I've merged it into this PR.

Will add the test within the next few days after I finish up something else.
